analyzed: rgyal ba yis ni gsang ba bshad pa gzhi la dgongs //

analyzed: gsungs par gang gyur de la sgo gsum dang bas phyag 'tshal te //

analyzed: mtha' drug la sogs bshad pa'i tshig la rab brten nas //

analyzed: kun du bzang po rdzas dran de la phan par bya ba'i phyir //

analyzed: rgyal ba'i 'dus ba bshad pa'i rgyud bcas la brten nas //

analyzed: don ni rnam pa gsum du 'dus //

original: rgyu ni theg chen rigs can te //

analyzed: mi gus de yi phyir ma byas //

analyzed: chen po'i rigs can gyi gang zag gis 'bras bu mchog thob par bya ba'i phyir ro //

translated: It is for the sake of those sentient beings of the age of dispute who have short lives, who are attached to wealth, and who have little wisdom.🔽Or, at that time, they would not enter the special tantras.

original: gsang ba de kho na la 'jug pa las kyang //
analyzed: gsang ba de kho na la 'jug pa las kyang //

analyzed: gsang la 'jug pa'i skal med la //

analyzed: sems can lugs kyi bstan bcos byed //

analyzed: rtsod pa'i dus su pan 'dogs 'gyur //

analyzed: zhes 'byung ba lta bu'o //

original: 'o na rim pa re res sam /
analyzed: 'o na rim pa re res sam /

original: 'on te thams cad kyis phan 'dogs par 'gyur /
analyzed: 'on te thams cad kyis phan 'dogs par 'gyur /

analyzed: de la phyogs dang po ltar na ni skas kyi rim pa ma yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: If it is the first case, then it is not a step of a ladder.

original: phyi ma ltar na yang /
analyzed: phyi ma ltar na yang /
translated: If it is the second case,🔽then it is not the case that

analyzed: rim pa gcig gis mngon sangs rgyas // zhes pa ma yin par 'gyur ro zhe na ma yin te /

analyzed: 'di ltar de nyid kyi rnam pa can gyi gang zag gi dbang du byas te rim pa re res kyang phan 'dogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: But it is not so, because it is in terms of the person who has that aspect that each step helps.🔽Also, it is in terms of the person that the five stages, etc.

analyzed: gzhan la rag las pa ni gang zag gi dbang du byas te rim lnga la sogs pa'o //

analyzed: gzhan yang rim pa gcig la yang skas kyi rim pa zhes bya ste /

analyzed: thos pa la sogs pas 'jug ste skas bzhin no //
translated: One enters by hearing, etc., like a ladder.

original: bsgom pa'i dbang du byas pa yang dang po ni skad cig ma'i rnal 'byor la 'jug go //
analyzed: bsgom pa'i dbang du byas pa yang dang po ni skad cig ma'i rnal 'byor la 'jug go //

original: de nas skad cig ma bcu la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de nas skad cig ma bcu la sogs pa ste /
translated: Then, in ten moments, etc.,

original: skas kyi rim pa bzhin no //
analyzed: skas kyi rim pa bzhin no //
translated: like the steps of a ladder.

original: de ni yan lag la 'jug par bya ste /
analyzed: de ni yan lag la 'jug par bya ste /

original: de la / dngos med rnam dag nam mkha' mnyam //
analyzed: de la / dngos med rnam dag nam mkha' mnyam //

analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pas dang por slob dpon gyis rang dad pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal ba'o //

original: de la dngos po med pa ni dngos po med pa ste /
analyzed: de la dngos po med pa ni dngos po med pa ste /

analyzed: gang la gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam pa dang bral ba de la de skad ces bya'o //

original: yang na snying gar byang chub sems kyi thig le gsal ba de @238b la yang de skad ces bya ste /
analyzed: yang na snying gar byang chub sems kyi thig le gsal ba de @238b la yang de skad ces bya ste /

original: 'od gsal ba dang shin tu nye ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'od gsal ba dang shin tu nye ba'i phyir ro //

original: ma lus tshig med yi ge bral //
analyzed: ma lus tshig med yi ge bral //
translated: Without remainder, wordless, free from syllables,

original: zhes pa ni dngos po dang dngos po med pa thams cad sgra'i brjod byar ma gyur te /
analyzed: zhes pa ni dngos po dang dngos po med pa thams cad sgra'i brjod byar ma gyur te /
translated: is all entities and non-entities not the expressed meaning of words.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: thams cad rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thams cad rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because all are pure by nature.

original: yang tshig dang yi ge las 'das pa ste /
analyzed: yang tshig dang yi ge las 'das pa ste /
translated: Also, beyond words and syllables

original: rdo rje 'das pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje 'das pa'o //
translated: is the transcendent vajra.

original: 'das dang ma 'ongs kun du son pa ni sgyu ma lta bu ste /
analyzed: 'das dang ma 'ongs kun du son pa ni sgyu ma lta bu ste /
translated: The transcendent and immanent is illusion-like.

original: 'das pa la sogs pa'i dus thams cad du ji lta ba de ltar don byed do //
analyzed: 'das pa la sogs pa'i dus thams cad du ji lta ba de ltar don byed do //
translated: It functions in all times, past, etc., just as it is.

original: yang na 'das pa la sogs pa ni sbrul pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: yang na 'das pa la sogs pa ni sbrul pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Or else, the past, etc., are the emanation, etc.

original: der son pa ni khyab pa ste bde ba chen po'i khu ba'o //
analyzed: der son pa ni khyab pa ste bde ba chen po'i khu ba'o //
translated: The one who has gone there is the pervasion, the essence of great bliss.

original: kun du ma lus thams cad stong //
analyzed: kun du ma lus thams cad stong //
translated: All is empty without exception.

original: zhes pa ni 'od gsal ba'i ye shes so //
analyzed: zhes pa ni 'od gsal ba'i ye shes so //
translated: This is the pristine awareness of utter lucidity.

original: de la phyag 'tshal ba ni rtogs pa'i sgo nas so //
analyzed: de la phyag 'tshal ba ni rtogs pa'i sgo nas so //
translated: To pay homage to that is to do so in terms of realization.

original: yang na de ni 'khor lo bzhi dang sbyar te /
analyzed: yang na de ni 'khor lo bzhi dang sbyar te /
translated: Alternatively, this can be correlated with the four cakras:

original: dngos med rnam dag ni bde ba chen po'o //
analyzed: dngos med rnam dag ni bde ba chen po'o //
translated: The pure absence of substance is the great bliss.

original: tshig med yi ge bral zhes pa ni longs spyod do //
analyzed: tshig med yi ge bral zhes pa ni longs spyod do //
translated: The absence of words and syllables is the enjoyment.

original: ma 'ongs kun du song zhes pa ni chos kyi 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: ma 'ongs kun du song zhes pa ni chos kyi 'khor lo'o //
translated: The one that pervades the future is the dharmacakra.

original: ma lus thams cad stong zhes pa ni sbrul pa'o //
analyzed: ma lus thams cad stong zhes pa ni sbrul pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of all without exception is the emanation.

original: de la dmigs pa ni phyag 'tshal ba'o //
analyzed: de la dmigs pa ni phyag 'tshal ba'o //
translated: To focus on that is to pay homage.

original: da ni sgrub pa'i thabs 'di rtsom pa gang la dgongs she na /
analyzed: da ni sgrub pa'i thabs 'di rtsom pa gang la dgongs she na /
translated: Now, what was the author’s intention in composing this method of practice?

original: rdo rje'i theg pa 'di la sngags kyi sgor spyod pa ni rnam pa gnyis te zhes gsungs na /
analyzed: rdo rje'i theg pa 'di la sngags kyi sgor spyod pa ni rnam pa gnyis te zhes gsungs na /
translated: In this Vajra Vehicle, there are two kinds of practice of the mantra door.

original: gang la shes rab dang ting nge 'dzin khyad par can yod pa de ni rdo rje theg pa'o //
analyzed: gang la shes rab dang ting nge 'dzin khyad par can yod pa de ni rdo rje theg pa'o //
translated: The Vajra Vehicle is that which has special wisdom and samadhi.

original: de'i sngags kyi sgor spyod pa ni de nyams su len pa'o //
analyzed: de'i sngags kyi sgor spyod pa ni de nyams su len pa'o //
translated: The practice of the mantra door in that is the practice of that.

original: 'di la gnyis yod pas gnyis te /
analyzed: 'di la gnyis yod pas gnyis te /
translated: There are two kinds of that, so it is two.

original: bskyed pa rdzogs pa'i dbang dag tu //
analyzed: bskyed pa rdzogs pa'i dbang dag tu //
translated: In the generation and completion stages,

original: gang zag gnyis ni thub pas gsungs //
analyzed: gang zag gnyis ni thub pas gsungs //
translated: the Sage taught two kinds of persons.

original: she'o // gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: she'o // gang yin zhe na /
translated: What are they?

original: gsang sngags la mchog tu gzhol ba dang / nang la mchog tu gzhol ba ste /
analyzed: gsang sngags la mchog tu gzhol ba dang / nang la mchog tu gzhol ba ste /
translated: Those who are devoted to the supreme of mantras and those who are devoted to the supreme of the inner.

original: sngags zlos pa la brtson pa dang / bsgom pa la brtson pa'o //
analyzed: sngags zlos pa la brtson pa dang / bsgom pa la brtson pa'o //
translated: Those who strive in mantra repetition and those who strive in meditation.

original: yang na bskyed pa'i rim pa dang / rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rigs can gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: yang na bskyed pa'i rim pa dang / rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rigs can gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: Or, those who have the lineage of the generation stage and those who have the lineage of the completion stage are called that.

original: de'i dbang du zhes bya ba ni tshig lhag ma'o //
analyzed: de'i dbang du zhes bya ba ni tshig lhag ma'o //
translated: The words “in that” are an ellipsis.

original: yang na thos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni thos pa sngon du song ba'o //
analyzed: yang na thos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni thos pa sngon du song ba'o //
translated: Or else, the perfection of hearing is that which precedes hearing.

original: gang gis thos pa sngon du song zhing ma rmongs la yang dag pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa des brtsams she'o //
analyzed: gang gis thos pa sngon du song zhing ma rmongs la yang dag pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa des brtsams she'o //
translated: That which precedes hearing, is not confused, and is endowed with right wisdom, that one is said to have composed.

original: gang gi phyir zhe na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: sems can thams cad rjes su gzung bar bya ba'i phyir du'o //🔽sems @239a * //
analyzed: sems can thams cad rjes su gzung bar bya ba'i phyir du'o // sems @239a * //
translated: In order to take care of all sentient beings.

original: can thams cad kyi tshogs dang / slob ma thams cad ni /
analyzed: can thams cad kyi tshogs dang / slob ma thams cad ni /
translated: The assembly of all sentient beings and all disciples

original: de rjes su gzung ba de dag theg pa chen po'i chos la rab tu gzhug pa'i phyir du'o //
analyzed: de rjes su gzung ba de dag theg pa chen po'i chos la rab tu gzhug pa'i phyir du'o //
translated: are to be taken care of by that, in order to introduce them to the teachings of the Great Vehicle.

original: de ni rgyud chen po las kyang de la dgongs pas don med do zhe na ma yin te /🔽mdo dang rgyud las gsungs pa'i tshig yang dag par gsal bar bya ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: de ni rgyud chen po las kyang de la dgongs pas don med do zhe na ma yin te / mdo dang rgyud las gsungs pa'i tshig yang dag par gsal bar bya ba'i phyir te /
translated: But if one says that it is meaningless because it is intended for the great tantras, that is not so.🔽It is in order to clarify the words spoken in the sūtras and tantras.

original: mdo sde dang rgyud sde thams cad na mi gsal ba tshig gsal ba dang / zur phyin pas don legs par dgod par bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mdo sde dang rgyud sde thams cad na mi gsal ba tshig gsal ba dang / zur phyin pas don legs par dgod par bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: In order to clarify the unclear words in all the sūtras and tantras, and to set forth the meaning well by means of the correct words.

original: mi gsal ba yang gang zag gnyis kyis rtogs par byed pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: mi gsal ba yang gang zag gnyis kyis rtogs par byed pa ma yin nam /
translated: Is it not the case that the unclear is also realized by two persons?

original: de 'dir ci'i phyir bstan pa la de'i phyir byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis khongs su chud par bya ba'i phyir zhes smos te /
analyzed: de 'dir ci'i phyir bstan pa la de'i phyir byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis khongs su chud par bya ba'i phyir zhes smos te /
translated: Why is it taught here? Therefore, it is said, “in order to be understood by childish ordinary beings.”

original: rgyud kyi don dgongs pa can la sogs pa blo ma byang ba'i gang zag gis rtogs par bya bar mi nus te /
analyzed: rgyud kyi don dgongs pa can la sogs pa blo ma byang ba'i gang zag gis rtogs par bya bar mi nus te /
translated: The meaning of the tantra, which is intended, and so on, cannot be realized by a person whose mind is untrained.

original: des rtogs par bya ba'i phyir yang 'di brtsams zhes so //
analyzed: des rtogs par bya ba'i phyir yang 'di brtsams zhes so //
translated: It is composed for the purpose of being realized by that [person].

original: gang la brten te brtsams she na /
analyzed: gang la brten te brtsams she na /
translated: In dependence on what was it composed?

original: tshig snyan cing zhes pa nas btud de zhes pa'i bar te go sla'o //
analyzed: tshig snyan cing zhes pa nas btud de zhes pa'i bar te go sla'o //
translated: From “pleasant words” up to “bowing down,” it is easy to understand.

original: sgrub pa'i thabs 'di yang dus gang la dgongs she na /
analyzed: sgrub pa'i thabs 'di yang dus gang la dgongs she na /
translated: In what time was this method of practice also intended?

original: rtsod pa'i dus su'o //
analyzed: rtsod pa'i dus su'o //
translated: In the time of dispute.

original: dus gzhan la ma dgongs pa ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: dus gzhan la ma dgongs pa ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why was it not intended in another time?

original: sngon byung bar gyur pa ni mi rigs so zhe'o //
analyzed: sngon byung bar gyur pa ni mi rigs so zhe'o //
translated: It is said that what occurred previously is unreasonable.

original: de la sgrub pa'i yan lag ni sgrub pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: de la sgrub pa'i yan lag ni sgrub pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: In that [text], the branch of practice is the stage of practice.

original: mar me ni dpe ste /
analyzed: mar me ni dpe ste /
translated: The lamp is an example.

original: gang gis gang la gsal bar byed pa yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: gang gis gang la gsal bar byed pa yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: That which illuminates something for someone is called that.

original: sngon byung bar gyur pa ni mi rigs zhes pa ni dus gsum du 'byung ba mi 'thad do //
analyzed: sngon byung bar gyur pa ni mi rigs zhes pa ni dus gsum du 'byung ba mi 'thad do //
translated: What has occurred previously is not reasonable means it is not tenable that it occurs in the three times.

original: de zhes pa ni gong ma dang 'brel ba'o //
analyzed: de zhes pa ni gong ma dang 'brel ba'o //
translated: That means it is connected to what precedes it.

original: ci'i phyir zhes pa ni 'dri ba'o //
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhes pa ni 'dri ba'o //
translated: Why is it so? is a question.

original: lan du rdzogs ldan zhes pa ni sbyin pa la sogs pa rab dang ldan pa dang / tshe dang bsod nams dang shes rab la sogs pa rab dang ldan pa ni rdzogs ldan no //
analyzed: lan du rdzogs ldan zhes pa ni sbyin pa la sogs pa rab dang ldan pa dang / tshe dang bsod nams dang shes rab la sogs pa rab dang ldan pa ni rdzogs ldan no //
translated: The answer is: The age of completeness is when there is the completeness of generosity and so on and the completeness of life, merit, wisdom and so on.

original: 'bring dang / tha ma dang / tha ma'i yang tha ma ci rigs su sbyar ro //
analyzed: 'bring dang / tha ma dang / tha ma'i yang tha ma ci rigs su sbyar ro //
translated: The middle, the end and the end of the end are to be applied as appropriate.

original: de bshad pa 'jig rten pa rnams tshe dang / nad med pa phun sum tshogs pa ni tshe khyad par can dang ldan pa ste /
analyzed: de bshad pa 'jig rten pa rnams tshe dang / nad med pa phun sum tshogs pa ni tshe khyad par can dang ldan pa ste /
translated: Its explanation is: When worldly beings are endowed with the excellence of life and health, they possess special life.

original: skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya khri ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya khri ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: This refers to the lifespan of beings, such as one hundred thousand years.

original: sbyin pa dang tshul khrims la sogs pas ni /
analyzed: sbyin pa dang tshul khrims la sogs pas ni /
translated: Generosity, ethics and so on

original: byang chub kyi phyogs kyis chos bsdu'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyogs kyis chos bsdu'o //
translated: are subsumed by the factors of enlightenment.

original: de dag dang ldan pa ni de dag mnga' ba'o //
analyzed: de dag dang ldan pa ni de dag mnga' ba'o //
translated: Endowed with those is the one who possesses them.

original: des cir 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: des cir 'gyur zhe na /
translated: What is the result of that?

original: bstan bcos la gnas @239b shing yongs su tshol ba ste /
analyzed: bstan bcos la gnas @239b shing yongs su tshol ba ste /
translated: He is established in the treatise and seeks.

original: phyi'i mdo la sogs pa yongs su tshol ba'o //
analyzed: phyi'i mdo la sogs pa yongs su tshol ba'o //
translated: He seeks the outer sutras, etc.

original: de kho na nyid shes pa la zhugs pa ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa chos kyi dbyings la zhugs pa ste /
analyzed: de kho na nyid shes pa la zhugs pa ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa chos kyi dbyings la zhugs pa ste /
translated: Engaged in the knowledge of reality is the one who has entered into the perfection stage, the realm of phenomena.

original: rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
translated: He is the Great Vajradhara.

original: zab cing rgya che ba ni de'i zhal nas gsungs pa'i chos te /
analyzed: zab cing rgya che ba ni de'i zhal nas gsungs pa'i chos te /
translated: The profound and vast is the Dharma spoken by him,

original: rtogs par dka' ba dang / don rgya chen po ston pa'o //
analyzed: rtogs par dka' ba dang / don rgya chen po ston pa'o //
translated: which is difficult to understand and teaches the vast meaning.

original: ji ltar ston zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar ston zhe na /
translated: How is it taught?

original: sbas pa'i sgra'i sgo nas te /
analyzed: sbas pa'i sgra'i sgo nas te /
translated: By means of the door of hidden language.

original: ma byin par len pas sangs rgyas zhes bstan pas kyang go bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ma byin par len pas sangs rgyas zhes bstan pas kyang go bar 'gyur ro //
translated: One will understand through the teaching that the Buddha is not given.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: shes rab mchog dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shes rab mchog dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because he possesses supreme wisdom.

original: lung gzhan las kyang /
analyzed: lung gzhan las kyang /
translated: Also, in another scripture:

original: gang tshe stong gsum dum bu la //
analyzed: gang tshe stong gsum dum bu la //
translated: When the three thousand worlds are shattered,🔽the life, merit,

original: sems can tshe dang bsod nams dang // las dang shes rab la sogs pa //
analyzed: sems can tshe dang bsod nams dang // las dang shes rab la sogs pa //
translated: karma, wisdom, etc.

original: rab tu gyur pa rdzogs ldan dus //
analyzed: rab tu gyur pa rdzogs ldan dus //
translated: The best time is the age of completeness.

original: 'bring ni gsum ldan dus yin te //
analyzed: 'bring ni gsum ldan dus yin te //
translated: The middling time is the age of three-fourths.

original: tha ma gnyis ldan dus su 'dod //🔽tha ma'i tha ma zhes bya ba //
analyzed: tha ma gnyis ldan dus su 'dod // tha ma'i tha ma zhes bya ba //
translated: The least time is the age of two-fourths.🔽The least of the least time is

original: bskal ba rtsod pa'i dus su sbyor //
analyzed: bskal ba rtsod pa'i dus su sbyor //
translated: the age of strife.

original: gsum po'i bstan pa 'di dag la //
analyzed: gsum po'i bstan pa 'di dag la //
translated: In these three ages,

original: rgyal ba'i bka' la yid ches 'gyur //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i bka' la yid ches 'gyur //
translated: the teachings of the Victor are believed.

original: phyis ni de las bzlog pa'o //🔽zhes 'byung ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: phyis ni de las bzlog pa'o // zhes 'byung ba lta bu'o //
translated: Later, they are the opposite.

original: 'o na gzhan las /
analyzed: 'o na gzhan las /
translated: But another text says:

original: rdzogs ldan dang ni gnyis ldan dang // rtsod pa'i dus te bzhi po la //
analyzed: rdzogs ldan dang ni gnyis ldan dang // rtsod pa'i dus te bzhi po la //
translated: In the four ages—the age of completeness, the age of three-fourths, the age of two-fourths, and the age of strife—

original: rgyal ba'i bka' la rmongs gyur pas //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i bka' la rmongs gyur pas //
translated: the teachings of the Victor are confused.

original: bstan pa rjes 'jug rnams kyis byed //
analyzed: bstan pa rjes 'jug rnams kyis byed //
translated: Therefore, the followers of the teachings do it.

original: ces pa 'di ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ces pa 'di ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is this?

original: lan du rdzogs ldan ni bskal pa dang po'i ma yin no //
analyzed: lan du rdzogs ldan ni bskal pa dang po'i ma yin no //
translated: The age of completeness is not the first eon.

original: 'o na gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na gang yin zhe na /
translated: What is it then?

original: rtsod pa'i dus la rtsod pa'i rdzogs ldan gyi dus la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: rtsod pa'i dus la rtsod pa'i rdzogs ldan gyi dus la sogs pa ste /
translated: The age of strife is the age of completeness of the age of strife, and so on.

original: dang po ni slob dpon gyis brtsams pa mthong bas shes par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dang po ni slob dpon gyis brtsams pa mthong bas shes par 'gyur ro //
translated: The first is known by seeing the composition of the master.

original: de nas brdar brtags pas shes par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas brdar brtags pas shes par 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, by examining the signs, one will understand.

original: de nas legs par bshad pas shes par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas legs par bshad pas shes par 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, by the good explanation, one will understand.

original: de nas yang dang yang du bshad pas shes par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas yang dang yang du bshad pas shes par 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, by explaining again and again, one will understand.

original: de dag ni rtsod pa'i dus bzhi dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: de dag ni rtsod pa'i dus bzhi dang sbyar ro //
translated: These are applied to the four times of dispute.

original: de bstan pa'i phyir de ltar ni rtsod pa'i dus te zhes pa la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: de bstan pa'i phyir de ltar ni rtsod pa'i dus te zhes pa la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
translated: In order to teach that, “Thus, it is the time of dispute,” and so on, is easy to understand.

original: don la rton par bya zhing chos kyi rjes su 'brang zhes pa ni don la tshad mar byed pa'o //
analyzed: don la rton par bya zhing chos kyi rjes su 'brang zhes pa ni don la tshad mar byed pa'o //
translated: “ One should rely on the meaning, and follow the Dharma” means that one should take the meaning as authoritative.

original: don gyi dbang 'di mthong nas zhes pa ni don dngos su rtogs nas zhes pa'o //
analyzed: don gyi dbang 'di mthong nas zhes pa ni don dngos su rtogs nas zhes pa'o //
translated: “ Seeing this power of the meaning” means that one should understand the meaning in actuality.

original: bskyed pa'i go rims zhes pa la sogs pa ni 'og nas ston to //
analyzed: bskyed pa'i go rims zhes pa la sogs pa ni 'og nas ston to //
translated: “ The order of generation,” and so on, will be taught below.

original: sngags kyi de khon nyid ni sngags ma nor ba'o //🔽yang @240a * //
analyzed: sngags kyi de khon nyid ni sngags ma nor ba'o // yang @240a * //
translated: The reality of mantra is the unerring mantra.

original: na sngags kyi de kho na nyid ni rdo rje bzlas pa'o //
analyzed: na sngags kyi de kho na nyid ni rdo rje bzlas pa'o //
translated: Or, the reality of mantra is vajra repetition.

original: phyag rgya'i de kho na nyid ni bskyed pa'i rim pa dang / gyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya'i de kho na nyid ni bskyed pa'i rim pa dang / gyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: The reality of the seal is the creation stage and the illusion-like.

original: bdag gi de kho na nyid ni sems la dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: bdag gi de kho na nyid ni sems la dmigs pa'o //
translated: The reality of the self is the focus on the mind.

original: chos kyi de kho na nyid ni 'od gsal ba'o //
analyzed: chos kyi de kho na nyid ni 'od gsal ba'o //
translated: The reality of the Dharma is luminosity.

original: lha'i de kho na nyid zung du 'jug pa'i sku'o //
analyzed: lha'i de kho na nyid zung du 'jug pa'i sku'o //
translated: The reality of the deity is the body of union.

original: de bshad ba'am de gsal bar bya ba'i phyir slob dpon gyi mdo dang rgyud dang rtogs pa'i rjes su 'brang zhe'o //
analyzed: de bshad ba'am de gsal bar bya ba'i phyir slob dpon gyi mdo dang rgyud dang rtogs pa'i rjes su 'brang zhe'o //
translated: In order to explain that or to clarify that, the master follows the sutras, tantras, and realizations.

original: de kho na nyid mi shes pa'i nyes pa lung gis bsgrub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de kho na nyid mi shes pa'i nyes pa lung gis bsgrub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: In order to prove the fault of not knowing reality by means of scripture,

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: it is said, The Bhagavān said... and so on.

original: bskal pa bye ba ni bskal pa chen po bye ba'i ba du'o ;
analyzed: bskal pa bye ba ni bskal pa chen po bye ba'i ba du'o ;
translated: For a billion eons means for a billion great eons.

original: / bsgrub kyang zhes pa ni tshig gi lhag ma'o //
analyzed: / bsgrub kyang zhes pa ni tshig gi lhag ma'o //
translated: Even if one practices is a verbal supplement.

original: de nyid bral na 'grub mi 'gyur //
analyzed: de nyid bral na 'grub mi 'gyur //
translated: If one is separated from that reality, one will not succeed.

original: zhes pa ni de kho na nyid kyi man ngag lnga dang dral na 'grub par 'gyur te /
analyzed: zhes pa ni de kho na nyid kyi man ngag lnga dang dral na 'grub par 'gyur te /
translated: If one is separated from the five essential instructions of reality, one will not succeed.

original: bya rog gi so rtog pa bzhin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: bya rog gi so rtog pa bzhin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: It is like the example of examining a crow's tooth.

original: lung gzhan yang bshad pa'i phyir lha mo bzhi zhus zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: lung gzhan yang bshad pa'i phyir lha mo bzhi zhus zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: In order to explain another scripture, he says the four goddesses asked, and so on.

original: thub pa chen po ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas te /
analyzed: thub pa chen po ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas te /
translated: The great sage is the buddhas of the three times,

original: rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
translated: the great Vajradhara.

original: des gsungs pa'i chos ni thub pa chen pos gsungs pa'i chos te /
analyzed: des gsungs pa'i chos ni thub pa chen pos gsungs pa'i chos te /
translated: The Dharma taught by him is the Dharma taught by the great sage.

original: du zhe na /
analyzed: du zhe na /
translated: How many?

original: brgyad khram bzhi stong ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i gnyen por ro //
analyzed: brgyad khram bzhi stong ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i gnyen por ro //
translated: 84,000, as antidotes to desire and so on.

original: gang gis de nyid mi shes pa zhes pa ni gang gis de kho na nyid bzlas pa la sogs pa mi shes na'o //
analyzed: gang gis de nyid mi shes pa zhes pa ni gang gis de kho na nyid bzlas pa la sogs pa mi shes na'o //
translated: If one does not know reality, if one does not know reality such as repetition and so on,

original: thams cad 'bras bu med pa ni gang bsgoms pa 'bras bu med pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad 'bras bu med pa ni gang bsgoms pa 'bras bu med pa'o //
translated: everything is fruitless, whatever is cultivated is fruitless.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: sgra tsam gyis ni dngos po'i rtog pa gang yang spong bar mi byed kyi /
analyzed: sgra tsam gyis ni dngos po'i rtog pa gang yang spong bar mi byed kyi /
translated: Mere sound does not eliminate any conception of entity at all.

original: rdo rje bzlas pa la sogs pas ni dngos po'i rtog pa spong bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rdo rje bzlas pa la sogs pas ni dngos po'i rtog pa spong bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: But vajra repetition and so on do eliminate conceptions of entity.

original: kyang zhes pa ni mi mthun pa'i rgyan no //
analyzed: kyang zhes pa ni mi mthun pa'i rgyan no //
translated: Also is a discordant ornament.

original: rdo rje slob ma ni rdo rje 'chang gi slob ma dang 'dra ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: rdo rje slob ma ni rdo rje 'chang gi slob ma dang 'dra ba'i phyir te /
translated: The vajra disciple is like a disciple of Vajradhara.

original: des gsol ba btab pa /
analyzed: des gsol ba btab pa /
translated: He makes the request:🔽One does not become enlightened without knowing reality.

original: de kho na nyid mi shes par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur zhes pa ni gang gis de khon nyid mi shes na bsgom par mi 'gyur la /
analyzed: de kho na nyid mi shes par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur zhes pa ni gang gis de khon nyid mi shes na bsgom par mi 'gyur la /
translated: This means that if one does not know reality, one will not meditate on it.

original: ma bsgoms na nyon mongs pa rnam par rtog pa stong  bar mi 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
analyzed: ma bsgoms na nyon mongs pa rnam par rtog pa stong  bar mi 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
translated: If one does not meditate, the afflictions will not be eliminated.

original: de bas na gsung rab kyi sgo nas nyan par 'tshal lo zhes pa ni lung gi sgo nas thos par 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: de bas na gsung rab kyi sgo nas nyan par 'tshal lo zhes pa ni lung gi sgo nas thos par 'dod pa'o //
translated: Therefore, I wish to listen through the scriptures. This means that he wishes to hear through the scriptures.

original: gang gi phyir zhes pa ni gong dang 'brel ba ste /
analyzed: gang gi phyir zhes pa ni gong dang 'brel ba ste /
translated: For what reason? This is connected to what was said above.

original: theg pa chen po pa ni phyi pa dang nang ba'o //
analyzed: theg pa chen po pa ni phyi pa dang nang ba'o //
translated: Mahāyāna refers to both outsiders and insiders.

original: rtog ge pa ni rigs pa'i sgor zhugs pa'o //
analyzed: rtog ge pa ni rigs pa'i sgor zhugs pa'o //
translated: Logicians are those who have entered the door of reasoning.

original: gzhan go @240b sla'o ;
analyzed: gzhan go @240b sla'o ;
translated: The rest is easy to understand.

original: / lan du yang dag pa gang yin pa de ni de kho na nyid do zhes pa ni rdo rje bzlas pa la sogs pa 'di ni yang dag pa dang 'dra ba'i phyir de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: / lan du yang dag pa gang yin pa de ni de kho na nyid do zhes pa ni rdo rje bzlas pa la sogs pa 'di ni yang dag pa dang 'dra ba'i phyir de skad ces bya'o //
translated: And also, that which is real is reality. This refers to Vajra Repetition and so forth, because they are similar to the real.

original: yang na yang dag pa'i don dam pa'o zhe'o //
analyzed: yang na yang dag pa'i don dam pa'o zhe'o //
translated: Or else, the real is the ultimate.

original: mi slu ba yang dngos po dang mthun pa ste /
analyzed: mi slu ba yang dngos po dang mthun pa ste /
translated: Also, non-deceptive is in accord with the thing.

original: dung la ser por shes pa ma yin gyis /
analyzed: dung la ser por shes pa ma yin gyis /
translated: It is not the cognition of yellow in a conch,

original: dung la dkar por shes pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dung la dkar por shes pa bzhin no //
translated: but rather the cognition of white in a conch.

original: mi slu ba gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: mi slu ba gang yin zhe na /
translated: What is non-deceptive?

original: yang dag pa'i tshul can gyi bdag nyid can gyi ting nge 'dzin te /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i tshul can gyi bdag nyid can gyi ting nge 'dzin te /
translated: It is the concentration which has the nature of the real mode,

original: don dam pa thob pa'i thabs su gyur pa'o //
analyzed: don dam pa thob pa'i thabs su gyur pa'o //
translated: the means for attaining the ultimate.

original: de nyid dris pa dang lan du /
analyzed: de nyid dris pa dang lan du /
translated: That itself is the question and answer.

original: gang bden pa gnyis gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid can te /
analyzed: gang bden pa gnyis gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid can te /
translated: That which has the characteristic of the non-duality of the two truths,

original: bskyed pa nas sgyu ma lta bu'i bar te kun rdzob kyi bden pa'o //
analyzed: bskyed pa nas sgyu ma lta bu'i bar te kun rdzob kyi bden pa'o //
translated: from the creation up to the illusion-like, is the conventional truth.

original: 'od gsal ba ni don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
analyzed: 'od gsal ba ni don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
translated: Luminous clarity is the ultimate truth.

original: gnyis su med pa ni rtog pa dang mi rtog pa dbyer med pa'i rang bzhin zung du 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: gnyis su med pa ni rtog pa dang mi rtog pa dbyer med pa'i rang bzhin zung du 'jug pa'o //
translated: Non-duality is the nature of the union of the inseparability of conceptualization and non-conceptualization.

original: de la slob pa thams cad ni ting nge 'dzin dang 'brel to //
analyzed: de la slob pa thams cad ni ting nge 'dzin dang 'brel to //
translated: Among them, all learners are connected with samadhi.

original: mi slob pa ni 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: mi slob pa ni 'bras bu'o //
translated: The non-learner is the result.

original: 'bras bu zhes bya ba yang gnyis te /
analyzed: 'bras bu zhes bya ba yang gnyis te /
translated: The so-called result is also twofold:

original: rdo rje bzlas pa la brten pa dang / de dang 'brel ba'i dngos grub ni 'bras bu'i gnas skabs pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje bzlas pa la brten pa dang / de dang 'brel ba'i dngos grub ni 'bras bu'i gnas skabs pa'o //
translated: The stage of the result is based on vajra repetition and the siddhis connected with it.

original: chos kyi sku ni mthar thug pa'o zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: chos kyi sku ni mthar thug pa'o zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: The ultimate is the dharmakaya.

original: bden pa gnyis ni dris pa'i lan du dang po kun rdzob dang gnyis pa don dam ni gong du bshad do //
analyzed: bden pa gnyis ni dris pa'i lan du dang po kun rdzob dang gnyis pa don dam ni gong du bshad do //
translated: The two truths are the first answer, the conventional, and the second answer, the ultimate, as explained above.

original: bden pa gnyis kyi mtshan nyid ji lta bu lags zhes pa ni bden pa gnyis kyi rang bzhin gang zhes pa dang / lan du bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje gtsug tor gyi rgyud las gsungs te zhes pa las rdo rje gtsug tor kho na zhes pa mdzes pa ma yin no zhe na 'di ni rdo rje gtsug tor kho na'i rjes su zhugs pa'i gang zag gi dbang du byas
analyzed: bden pa gnyis kyi mtshan nyid ji lta bu lags zhes pa ni bden pa gnyis kyi rang bzhin gang zhes pa dang / lan du bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje gtsug tor gyi rgyud las gsungs te zhes pa las rdo rje gtsug tor kho na zhes pa mdzes pa ma yin no zhe na 'di ni rdo rje gtsug tor kho na'i rjes su zhugs pa'i gang zag gi dbang du byas
translated: This is from the perspective of the person who has entered only the Vajra-uṣṇīṣa.

original: pa'o // de la dris pa'i lan du gsang ba'i bdag po zhes pa ni bos pa ste /
analyzed: pa'o // de la dris pa'i lan du gsang ba'i bdag po zhes pa ni bos pa ste /
translated: There, in reply to the question, Lord of Secrets is the vocative.

original: chos thams cad ni chos thams cad do //
analyzed: chos thams cad ni chos thams cad do //
translated: All phenomena are all phenomena.

original: gang yin zhe na phung po dang zhes pa la sogs pa ste go sla'o //
analyzed: gang yin zhe na phung po dang zhes pa la sogs pa ste go sla'o //
translated: What are they? The aggregates and so forth are easy to understand.

original: yang bris pa bdag cag lta bu zhes pa la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: yang bris pa bdag cag lta bu zhes pa la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Again, it is said, We are like this and so forth.

original: bdag cag lta bu ni bdag dang 'dra ba zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: bdag cag lta bu ni bdag dang 'dra ba zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: We are like this means we are similar to the self.

original: thog ma med pa nas phyi rol gyi dngos po rnam pa sna tshogs su mngon par zhen pas shes pa ni tshe rabs thog ma med pa nas ma rig pa'i stobs kyis yul la 'dod chags dang zhe sdang la sogs pa bskyed nas de'i bag chags kun gzhi
analyzed: thog ma med pa nas phyi rol gyi dngos po rnam pa sna tshogs su mngon par zhen pas shes pa ni tshe rabs thog ma med pa nas ma rig pa'i stobs kyis yul la 'dod chags dang zhe sdang la sogs pa bskyed nas de'i bag chags kun gzhi
translated: Since beginningless time, consciousness has been fixated on external entities as having various aspects. Due to the power of ignorance, it has generated attachment and aversion toward objects throughout beginningless lifetimes.🔽

original: la zhe na par chags pa'o //
analyzed: la zhe na par chags pa'o //
translated: Since beginningless time, consciousness has been attached to external things in various ways.  Since beginningless lives, through the power of ignorance, it has generated attachment and aversion to objects, and its habitual tendencies have been attached to the foundation consciousness.

original: des cir 'gyur zhe na /🔽yod pa dang zhes bya ba la @241a * //
analyzed: des cir 'gyur zhe na / yod pa dang zhes bya ba la @241a * //
translated: What is the result of that?

original: sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: sogs pa smos te /
translated: It is said, “existence and so on.”

original: phyi dang nang gi gzugs la sogs pa yod pa dang / rtag pa dang ther zug par gyur te /
analyzed: phyi dang nang gi gzugs la sogs pa yod pa dang / rtag pa dang ther zug par gyur te /
translated: Existence is external and internal forms and so on, which are permanent and eternal.

original: de spang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de spang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It is in order to abandon that.

original: med pa ni chad par lta'o //
analyzed: med pa ni chad par lta'o //
translated: Nonexistence is the view of annihilation.

original: gcig ni gcig ste mu stegs kyis ba rtag pa'i bdag lta bu'o //
analyzed: gcig ni gcig ste mu stegs kyis ba rtag pa'i bdag lta bu'o //
translated: One is one, like the eternal self of the tīrthikas.

original: du ma ni rdul phra rab sil bu'o //
analyzed: du ma ni rdul phra rab sil bu'o //
translated: Many is the individual subtle particle.

original: de dag tu gyur pa spang ba'i phyir //
analyzed: de dag tu gyur pa spang ba'i phyir //
translated: It is in order to abandon those.

original: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i go rims kyi ting nge 'dzin la slob ces pa ni tha mal pa'i rtog pa spang ba'i phyir bskyed pa'i rim pa la slob par byed do //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i go rims kyi ting nge 'dzin la slob ces pa ni tha mal pa'i rtog pa spang ba'i phyir bskyed pa'i rim pa la slob par byed do //
translated: The phrase trains in the meditative stabilization of the sequence of the perfection stage means that in order to abandon ordinary thoughts, one trains in the creation stage.

original: rim pa gzhan la yang de bzhin te /🔽go rims ji lta ba bzhin du slob ces pa ni rim gyis bslab pa'am /
analyzed: rim pa gzhan la yang de bzhin te / go rims ji lta ba bzhin du slob ces pa ni rim gyis bslab pa'am /
translated: The same is true of the other stages.

original: cig car gyis bslab pa'am /
analyzed: cig car gyis bslab pa'am /
translated: The phrase trains in the sequence means that one trains either gradually or instantaneously.

original: 'on te rim pa ci rigs sam go rims gang zhe'o //
analyzed: 'on te rim pa ci rigs sam go rims gang zhe'o //
translated: Or else, what is the sequence?

original: lan du rim gyis 'jug par bya'i /
analyzed: lan du rim gyis 'jug par bya'i /
translated: The reply is one should enter gradually,

original: cig car ni ma yin no zhes pa ni rim pa lnga dang gcig gi dbang gis de ni gnyis so //
analyzed: cig car ni ma yin no zhes pa ni rim pa lnga dang gcig gi dbang gis de ni gnyis so //
translated: not instantaneously. This is twofold by the power of the five stages and the one stage.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ltar 'jig rten na gang zag rigs ni gnyis te /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'jig rten na gang zag rigs ni gnyis te /
translated: Because in the world, there are two types of persons:

original: de nyid kyi rnam pa can dang / gzhan la rag las pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi rnam pa can dang / gzhan la rag las pa'o //
translated: those who have the nature of that and those who depend on others.

original: dang po'i dbang du lam lnga'o //
analyzed: dang po'i dbang du lam lnga'o //
translated: The first is by the power of the five stages.

original: phyi ma ltar na ni lam gcig ste /
analyzed: phyi ma ltar na ni lam gcig ste /
translated: The latter is the one stage,

original: rim pa lngas 'jug par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rim pa lngas 'jug par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because one enters by means of the five stages.

original: 'o na rdo rje bzlas pa kho na rim gyis 'jug par ji ltar bya zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na rdo rje bzlas pa kho na rim gyis 'jug par ji ltar bya zhe na /
translated: How is it that only vajra repetition is to be entered gradually?

original: 'di ltar dang po ni thos pa'i shes rab kyis 'jug go //
analyzed: 'di ltar dang po ni thos pa'i shes rab kyis 'jug go //
translated: Thus, first one enters by the wisdom of hearing.

original: de nas bsam pa dang bsgom pa'i rim pa bzhin no //
analyzed: de nas bsam pa dang bsgom pa'i rim pa bzhin no //
translated: Then, in the order of reflection and meditation.

original: 'on bsgom pa'i rim pas ji ltar 'jug ce na /
analyzed: 'on bsgom pa'i rim pas ji ltar 'jug ce na /
translated: But how does one enter by the order of meditation?

original: 'jug pa rdo rje'i bzlas pa ni cig car 'jug pa 'bras bu med pa'i don ni dang po rjes su dran pa'i rnal 'byor la 'jug go //
analyzed: 'jug pa rdo rje'i bzlas pa ni cig car 'jug pa 'bras bu med pa'i don ni dang po rjes su dran pa'i rnal 'byor la 'jug go //
translated: Vajra repetition as entry is the meaning of simultaneous entry without result. First one enters the yoga of recollection.

original: de nas skad cig ma'i rnal 'byor la 'jug go //
analyzed: de nas skad cig ma'i rnal 'byor la 'jug go //
translated: Then one enters the yoga of the instant.

original: de nas kha dog la dmigs so //
analyzed: de nas kha dog la dmigs so //
translated: Then one focuses on color.

original: de nas kha dog dang dbyibs gnyis ka la dmigs so //
analyzed: de nas kha dog dang dbyibs gnyis ka la dmigs so //
translated: Then one focuses on both color and shape.

original: de nas sdud pa dang gnas par byed do //
analyzed: de nas sdud pa dang gnas par byed do //
translated: Then one gathers and stabilizes.

original: de nas rdo rje bzlas pa byed do //
analyzed: de nas rdo rje bzlas pa byed do //
translated: Then one performs vajra repetition.

original: de bas na rdo rje bzlas pa bsgom pa yang rim pa bzhin no //
analyzed: de bas na rdo rje bzlas pa bsgom pa yang rim pa bzhin no //
translated: Therefore, the meditation of vajra repetition is also in order.

original: gzhan la yang de dag shes par bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan la yang de dag shes par bya'o //
translated: This should be understood for others as well.

original: de yang gang las shes she na /
analyzed: de yang gang las shes she na /
translated: And how is that known?

original: de'i lung bstan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i lung bstan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: In order to cite a scriptural source for that, he says, “The Lord himself said in the Descent into Laṅkā Sutra.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kho nas lang kar gshegs pa las gsungs kyi /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kho nas lang kar gshegs pa las gsungs kyi /
translated: The Lord himself said it in the Descent into Laṅkā Sutra.

original: gzhan gyis gsungs pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan gyis gsungs pa ni ma yin no //
translated: It was not said by anyone else.

original: gang la gang gis zhus te gsungs she na /
analyzed: gang la gang gis zhus te gsungs she na /
translated: To whom and by whom was it said?

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das la zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das la zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: He says, “Then the great bodhisattva Mañjuśrī asked the Lord.”

original: thub pa chen po @241b bcom ldan 'das nyid la blo gros chen pos zhus te gsungs so //
analyzed: thub pa chen po @241b bcom ldan 'das nyid la blo gros chen pos zhus te gsungs so //
translated: The great sage, the Lord himself, was asked by the great-minded one and said it.

original: sdud pa pe yang yon tan ji lta bu dang ldan zhe na /
analyzed: sdud pa pe yang yon tan ji lta bu dang ldan zhe na /
translated: What kind of qualities does the compiler have?

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ste /
translated: He is a bodhisattva, a great being.

original: rang byang chub par bya ba dang / gzhan byang chub la dgod pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: rang byang chub par bya ba dang / gzhan byang chub la dgod pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: He is called that because he has the intention to attain enlightenment himself and to establish others in enlightenment.

original: chen po ni 'dir chos dang dus dang bsam pa la sogs pa rgya che ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chen po ni 'dir chos dang dus dang bsam pa la sogs pa rgya che ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Great here means that his Dharma, time, intention, and so forth are vast.

original: ci'i phyir zhus she na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhus she na /
translated: Why did he ask?

original: rang gi sems snang ba'i rgyu rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: rang gi sems snang ba'i rgyu rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir te /
translated: In order to purify the cause of the appearance of one's own mind.

original: rang gi rgyud dang gzhan gyi rgyud la 'khor ba'i sa bon yod pa de sbyang ba'i thabs yod par bya ba'i phyir zhus zhes so //
analyzed: rang gi rgyud dang gzhan gyi rgyud la 'khor ba'i sa bon yod pa de sbyang ba'i thabs yod par bya ba'i phyir zhus zhes so //
translated: In order to show that there is a method of purifying the seeds of cyclic existence that exist in one's own continuum and in the continuums of others, he says, ask.

original: de nyid ni go sla'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni go sla'o //
translated: That is easy to understand.

original: lan du blo gros chen po zhes pa ni bos pa ste /
analyzed: lan du blo gros chen po zhes pa ni bos pa ste /
translated: In response, Mahāmati is the vocative.

original: yang dag pa'i don dang ldan zhing spobs pa khyad par can dang ldan pa'i blo gros chen po zhu ba zhus pa legs so //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i don dang ldan zhing spobs pa khyad par can dang ldan pa'i blo gros chen po zhu ba zhus pa legs so //
translated: Mahāmati who has the meaning of reality and who has special eloquence, your request is good.

original: sems rtse gcig tu bsdus la gus par nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do zhes pa lhag ma'o //
analyzed: sems rtse gcig tu bsdus la gus par nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do zhes pa lhag ma'o //
translated: Gather your mind one-pointedly, listen respectfully, and keep it in mind, and I will explain. The rest is as before.

original: gang zhe na rang gi sems snang ba'i rgyud ni snang bas 'jug pas bdag gi cig car ni ma yin no zhes pa ni gong du bshad zin to //
analyzed: gang zhe na rang gi sems snang ba'i rgyud ni snang bas 'jug pas bdag gi cig car ni ma yin no zhes pa ni gong du bshad zin to //
translated: What is it? The continuum of the appearance of one's own mind is not all at once, because it engages through appearance. This has been explained above.

original: dang po'i dpe dgod pa shing aa mra'i 'bras bu ni rim gyis smin par 'gyur gyi cig car ma yin no zhes pa ni yul gang zhig na shing aa mra zhes bya ba yod pa de la dpe dgod pa ste /
analyzed: dang po'i dpe dgod pa shing aa mra'i 'bras bu ni rim gyis smin par 'gyur gyi cig car ma yin no zhes pa ni yul gang zhig na shing aa mra zhes bya ba yod pa de la dpe dgod pa ste /
translated: The mango tree is a tree that exists in a certain place.

original: shing aa mra yang dang po sa bon 'byung bar byed do //🔽gang gi tshe sa bon rkyen gzhan dang ldan pa de'i tshe myu gu 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: shing aa mra yang dang po sa bon 'byung bar byed do // gang gi tshe sa bon rkyen gzhan dang ldan pa de'i tshe myu gu 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The mango tree first produces a seed.🔽When the seed has the other conditions, then the sprout arises.

original: gang gi tshe myu gu rkyen gzhan dang ldan pa de'i tshe sdong bu 'byung bar 'gyur ro //🔽gang gi tshe sdong bu rkyen gzhan dang ldan pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe myu gu rkyen gzhan dang ldan pa de'i tshe sdong bu 'byung bar 'gyur ro // gang gi tshe sdong bu rkyen gzhan dang ldan pa de'i tshe /
translated: When the sprout has the other conditions, then the stem arises.

original: yal ga dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu rim gyis 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yal ga dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu rim gyis 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: When the stem has the other conditions, then the branches, leaves, flowers, and fruit arise gradually.

original: don ni go sla'o //
analyzed: don ni go sla'o //
translated: The meaning is easy to understand.

original: dpe gnyis pa dgod pa /
analyzed: dpe gnyis pa dgod pa /
translated: The second example is stated:🔽The potter makes his vessels gradually.

original: rdza mkhan gyi snod rnams kyang rim gyis byed kyis zhes pa ni rdza mkhan grags pa'i yul pa la dpe dgod pa ste /
analyzed: rdza mkhan gyi snod rnams kyang rim gyis byed kyis zhes pa ni rdza mkhan grags pa'i yul pa la dpe dgod pa ste /
translated: The potter is a potter who is famous in a certain place.

original: dper na rdza mkhan mkhas pa rdza ma'i las dang bya ba la goms pa kha cig  ni dang por 'jim pa brdung ba dang / bsre ba dang / g-yog pa dang / sreg pa'i bar du byed kyi cig car ma yin no //
analyzed: dper na rdza mkhan mkhas pa rdza ma'i las dang bya ba la goms pa kha cig  ni dang por 'jim pa brdung ba dang / bsre ba dang / g-yog pa dang / sreg pa'i bar du byed kyi cig car ma yin no //
translated: For example, some skilled potters, who are familiar with the work and activities of pottery, first pound the clay, mix it, knead it, and so on, up to the point of firing, but not all at once.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'jig rten pa'i rdza ma de ni rim gyis 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i rdza ma de ni rim gyis 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because that worldly pottery is characterized by gradual production.

original: gzhan go sla'o //🔽de ma grags pa'i gang zag kha cig ni lung gi rjes @242a * //
analyzed: gzhan go sla'o // de ma grags pa'i gang zag kha cig ni lung gi rjes @242a * //
translated: The others are easy to understand.

original: su mi 'jug la /
analyzed: su mi 'jug la /
translated: Some individuals who are not well known do not follow the scriptures.🔽Some who delight in elaboration do not follow that scripture.

original: rgyas pa la dga' ba kha cig  ni lung de'i rjes su yang mi 'jug pas de'i phyir dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: rgyas pa la dga' ba kha cig  ni lung de'i rjes su yang mi 'jug pas de'i phyir dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, the “heroic stride samādhi” and so on are taught.

original: bcom ldan 'das zhes pa ni bdud bzhi bcom pa dang yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa'i ston pa la bos pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das zhes pa ni bdud bzhi bcom pa dang yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa'i ston pa la bos pa'o //
translated: “Blessed One” refers to the Teacher who has conquered the four māras and possesses all good qualities.

original: byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa' ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa' ste /
translated: “Bodhisattva” means a bodhisattva.

original: des bslab pa thams cad la rlom sems ma mchis te /
analyzed: des bslab pa thams cad la rlom sems ma mchis te /
translated: He has no conceit with regard to any of the trainings.

original: lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab pa la sogs pa la thod rgal ma yin par 'jug pa gang yin pa de ji ltar bslab ces pa'i lan du /
analyzed: lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab pa la sogs pa la thod rgal ma yin par 'jug pa gang yin pa de ji ltar bslab ces pa'i lan du /
translated: How does he enter into the training in higher wisdom and so on without skipping steps?

original: blo gros brtan pa zhes pa ni bos pa'o //
analyzed: blo gros brtan pa zhes pa ni bos pa'o //
translated: Steadfast Intellect is a vocative.

original: dper na zhes pa ni dpe dgod pa ste /
analyzed: dper na zhes pa ni dpe dgod pa ste /
translated: For example is the statement of a simile.

original: bslab pa la rim gyis 'jug pa ni 'phong slob pa dang 'dra zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: bslab pa la rim gyis 'jug pa ni 'phong slob pa dang 'dra zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: The gradual entry into the trainings is like the training in archery.

original: ji ltar 'dra zhe na /🔽de'i phyir 'phong gi slob dpon nam /
analyzed: ji ltar 'dra zhe na / de'i phyir 'phong gi slob dpon nam /
translated: How is it like that?

original: 'phong gi slob ma zhes pa la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: 'phong gi slob ma zhes pa la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Therefore, it says the archery teacher or the archery student... and so on.🔽At first, they shoot at a target made of cow hide.

original: thog mar ba glang gi ko ba la phog par byed do zhes pa ni 'phong slob pa gang zhig gi shing ring po la ba glang gi ko ba 'then te /
analyzed: thog mar ba glang gi ko ba la phog par byed do zhes pa ni 'phong slob pa gang zhig gi shing ring po la ba glang gi ko ba 'then te /
translated: The training in archery means that the archery teacher stretches a target made of cow hide on a long wooden board.

original: de la dang por ni 'dom bdun la slob po /
analyzed: de la dang por ni 'dom bdun la slob po /
translated: At first, they train at a distance of seven cubits.

original: de nas 'dom dgu dang nyi shu dang / lnga bcu la sogs pa la slob po /
analyzed: de nas 'dom dgu dang nyi shu dang / lnga bcu la sogs pa la slob po /
translated: Then they train at distances of nine, twenty, fifty, and so on.

original: de la phog par ma gyur pa de srid du slob par byed do //
analyzed: de la phog par ma gyur pa de srid du slob par byed do //
translated: He trains as long as he does not hit it.

original: phyis mig 'dzums la sogs par byas par yang 'phog pa ni de'i mthar phyin pa'i chad do //
analyzed: phyis mig 'dzums la sogs par byas par yang 'phog pa ni de'i mthar phyin pa'i chad do //
translated: Later, when he hits it even when he closes his eyes, etc. , he has perfected it.

original: skyes bu de dang por ba glang gi ko ba la slob /
analyzed: skyes bu de dang por ba glang gi ko ba la slob /
translated: That man first trains on an elephant hide.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: de ni nus pa zhen pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de ni nus pa zhen pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because it is capable of withstanding it,

original: ba glang gi ko ba dang ko ba tsam las chung ba ni phog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ba glang gi ko ba dang ko ba tsam las chung ba ni phog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: and because an elephant hide or something similar to it is not pierced.

original: de bas na dang por ba glang gi ko ba la phog par byed do //
analyzed: de bas na dang por ba glang gi ko ba la phog par byed do //
translated: Therefore, he first hits an elephant hide.

original: gzhan go sla'o //🔽de'i don bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gzhan go sla'o // de'i don bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: The rest is easy to understand.🔽In order to demonstrate its meaning, he says:

original: blo gros brtan pa'i zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: blo gros brtan pa'i zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: The steadfast one, etc.

original: dpa' bar 'gro ba ni thogs pa med par 'gro ba ste /
analyzed: dpa' bar 'gro ba ni thogs pa med par 'gro ba ste /
translated: Heroic progress is progress without obstruction.

original: ting nge 'dzin gang gis mi mthun pa'i tshogs 'joms pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang gis mi mthun pa'i tshogs 'joms pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: That meditative concentration by which one destroys the mass of resistance is called that.

original: de la gnas pa ni de mthar phyin pa'o //
analyzed: de la gnas pa ni de mthar phyin pa'o //
translated: Abiding in that is its perfection.

original: phyis chos gang la yang mi slob pa ni 'og ma la mi slob pa ste gnas skabs pa'o //
analyzed: phyis chos gang la yang mi slob pa ni 'og ma la mi slob pa ste gnas skabs pa'o //
translated: Later, not training in any dharma is not training in the lower, which is temporary.

original: gang na bslab bya thams cad bral bas me slob pa ste /
analyzed: gang na bslab bya thams cad bral bas me slob pa ste /
translated: Since there is no training in anything, there is no training.

original: mthar thug par bshad pa'o //
analyzed: mthar thug par bshad pa'o //
translated: That is explained as the ultimate.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes pa ni gang dang 'brel pa'o //
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes pa ni gang dang 'brel pa'o //
translated: Why is that?

original: ting nge 'dzin la lags par bslab pa'i phyir zhes pa ni skyon thams cad dang bral bas bslab pa'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin la lags par bslab pa'i phyir zhes pa ni skyon thams cad dang bral bas bslab pa'o //
translated: Since one trains in samādhi, one trains in being free from all faults.🔽What are those faults?

original: skyon de yang gang @242b zhen 'di ltar lta ba dang ldan pa /
analyzed: skyon de yang gang @242b zhen 'di ltar lta ba dang ldan pa /
translated: One who possesses that view

original: spyod pa dang ldan pa /
analyzed: spyod pa dang ldan pa /
translated: possesses conduct.

original: dbang thob pa /🔽dam tshig dang ldan pa /
analyzed: dbang thob pa / dam tshig dang ldan pa /
translated: One obtains power.🔽One possesses samaya.

original: gsang thub pa /

analyzed: rim gyis 'jug pa'i go rims ni gang zag gnyis la bsams pa'i phyir ro zhes pa lta bu'o //
translated: The sequence of the gradual engagement is for the sake of the two kinds of persons.🔽The power of previous momentum is actualized.

original: sngon gyi 'phan shugs kyi stobs kyis mngon du gyur ces pa ni zung du 'jug pa gnyis su med pa /
analyzed: sngon gyi 'phan shugs kyi stobs kyis mngon du gyur ces pa ni zung du 'jug pa gnyis su med pa /
translated: This is the union of nondual

original: bslab pa thams cad dang bral ba /🔽gzung ba mi dmigs /
analyzed: bslab pa thams cad dang bral ba / gzung ba mi dmigs /
translated: free from all training,🔽without the perception of an object,

original: 'dzin pa mi dmigs /
analyzed: 'dzin pa mi dmigs /
translated: without the perception of a subject,

original: rgyu mi dmigs /
analyzed: rgyu mi dmigs /
translated: without the perception of a cause,

original: rgyu dang rkyen gyi 'bras bu mi dmigs /
analyzed: rgyu dang rkyen gyi 'bras bu mi dmigs /
translated: without the perception of a result of cause and condition,

original: bdag dang sems can dang srog la sogs pa mi dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: bdag dang sems can dang srog la sogs pa mi dmigs pa'o //
translated: without the perception of a self, a sentient being, a life force, and so on.

original: 'o na sprul pa'i sku la sogs pa ji ltar 'byung zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na sprul pa'i sku la sogs pa ji ltar 'byung zhe na /
translated: Well then, how do the emanation body and so on occur?

original: sngon gyi smon lam la sogs pa dang las kyis ji ltar yang snang ste /
analyzed: sngon gyi smon lam la sogs pa dang las kyis ji ltar yang snang ste /
translated: They appear in any way through previous aspirations and so on and karma,

original: zla ba dang chu zla bzhin no //🔽'o na dngos su'am /
analyzed: zla ba dang chu zla bzhin no // 'o na dngos su'am /
translated: like the moon and the reflection of the moon in water.

original: dngos su ma yin yang snang zhe na /
analyzed: dngos su ma yin yang snang zhe na /
translated: Well then, do they appear directly or not directly?

original: dang po ltar na ni longs spyod rdzogs pa la sogs pa tha dad pa dang dmigs pa med pa la sogs pa nyams par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dang po ltar na ni longs spyod rdzogs pa la sogs pa tha dad pa dang dmigs pa med pa la sogs pa nyams par 'gyur ro //
translated: If it is the first, then the enjoyment body and so on would be different and the absence of perception and so on would be undermined.

original: phyi ma ltar na ni ri bong la sogs pa'i rva yang ngo zhe na ma yin te /
analyzed: phyi ma ltar na ni ri bong la sogs pa'i rva yang ngo zhe na ma yin te /
translated: If it is the latter, then even the horns of a rabbit would be so.

original: thugs rje'i stobs kyis ji ltar yang snang ste /
analyzed: thugs rje'i stobs kyis ji ltar yang snang ste /
translated: It is not so, because it appears in any way through the power of compassion.

original: sgyu ma bzhin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: sgyu ma bzhin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: It is like an illusion.

original: gzhan go sla'o //
analyzed: gzhan go sla'o //
translated: The other lines are easy to understand.

original: las dang po pa la sogs pa sngon du ma song na cir 'gyur zhe na lus rnam par dben pa med par ngag rnam par dben pa la 'jug mi nus te /
analyzed: las dang po pa la sogs pa sngon du ma song na cir 'gyur zhe na lus rnam par dben pa med par ngag rnam par dben pa la 'jug mi nus te /
translated: If one does not proceed in the order beginning with the beginner, what happens? One cannot enter into speech isolation without body isolation.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: tha mal pa'i lus ma spangs pa'i phyir ro ;
analyzed: tha mal pa'i lus ma spangs pa'i phyir ro ;
translated: Because one has not abandoned the ordinary body.

original: / gang gi phyir dang po tha mal pa'i lus ma sngags par bya ba gzhan la 'jug par mi nus pa de'i phyir dang po lus rnam par dben pa la 'jug ste /
analyzed: / gang gi phyir dang po tha mal pa'i lus ma sngags par bya ba gzhan la 'jug par mi nus pa de'i phyir dang po lus rnam par dben pa la 'jug ste /
translated: Since one cannot enter into the other yogas without first abandoning the ordinary body, one enters into body isolation at the beginning.

original: ba glang gi ko ba bzhin no //
analyzed: ba glang gi ko ba bzhin no //
translated: It is like the hide of an ox.🔽Another text says:

original: gzhan las / nad kyis zin pa'i lus la ni //
analyzed: gzhan las / nad kyis zin pa'i lus la ni //
translated: In a body afflicted by disease,

original: las rnams kun la mthu med pa //
analyzed: las rnams kun la mthu med pa //
translated: all activities are powerless.

original: de bzhin nyon mongs pas zin pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin nyon mongs pas zin pa'o //
translated: Likewise, in one afflicted by afflictions,

original: las rnams kun la mthu med do //
analyzed: las rnams kun la mthu med do //
translated: all activities are powerless.

original: zhes pa dang / gzhan yang /
analyzed: zhes pa dang / gzhan yang /
translated: And also:

original: bskyed ba yi ni sbyor med par //
analyzed: bskyed ba yi ni sbyor med par //
translated: Without the yoga of generation,

original: rdzogs pa pa la dngos grub med //
analyzed: rdzogs pa pa la dngos grub med //
translated: there is no success in completion.

original: ces 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ces 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: rim pa gzhan la yang de ltar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: rim pa gzhan la yang de ltar shes par bya'o //
translated: This should be understood for the other stages as well.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis go rims nges pa 'di ci'i phyir mdzad ce na @244b lan du /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis go rims nges pa 'di ci'i phyir mdzad ce na @244b lan du /
translated: Why did the Bhagavat make this definite order?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi don gyi dbang 'di la gzigs nas zhes pa ni /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi don gyi dbang 'di la gzigs nas zhes pa ni /
translated: The Bhagavat, seeing this controlling power of the object,

original: med na mi 'byung ba 'di la gzigs nas zhes so //
analyzed: med na mi 'byung ba 'di la gzigs nas zhes so //
translated: seeing this necessary relation,

original: gang med na gang mi 'byung zhe na /
analyzed: gang med na gang mi 'byung zhe na /
translated: What does not occur without what?

original: rdo rje bzlas pa med na sems la dmigs pa mi 'byung ste /
analyzed: rdo rje bzlas pa med na sems la dmigs pa mi 'byung ste /
translated: The mental orientation does not occur without vajra repetition,

original: sa bon dang myu gu la sogs pa lta bu'o //🔽gang yod na de 'byung ste /
analyzed: sa bon dang myu gu la sogs pa lta bu'o // gang yod na de 'byung ste /
translated: like the seed and sprout, etc.🔽What occurs when what exists?

original: de la rag las pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la rag las pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It occurs when that exists, because it is dependent on that.

original: de'i phyir go rims gsungs she'o //🔽'o na don gyi 'bras bu yang rim pa zhig gam //
analyzed: de'i phyir go rims gsungs she'o // 'o na don gyi 'bras bu yang rim pa zhig gam //
translated: Therefore, the order is taught.

original: de las gzhan pa zhig ce na /
analyzed: de las gzhan pa zhig ce na /
translated: Now, is the result of the object also in that order, or is it different?

original: de'i phyir rim gyis 'jug pas rdzogs pa'i rim pa la bslabs pas shes pa gong bzhin du bslab pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir rim gyis 'jug pas rdzogs pa'i rim pa la bslabs pas shes pa gong bzhin du bslab pa'o //
translated: Therefore, by the gradual engagement, one trains in the completion stage, and the consciousness is trained as before.

original: des cir 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: des cir 'gyur zhe na /
translated: What is the result?

original: 'bras bu cig car pa thob ste /
analyzed: 'bras bu cig car pa thob ste /
translated: The instantaneous result is attained,

original: don dam pa'i bden pa thob pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don dam pa'i bden pa thob pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the ultimate truth is attained.

original: 'o na bsal ba dang thob pa yang gang zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na bsal ba dang thob pa yang gang zhe na /
translated: Now, what is the object to be removed and what is the object to be attained?

original: rnam par rtog pa ni bsal bar bya ba ste /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa ni bsal bar bya ba ste /
translated: Conceptualization is the object to be removed,

original: sgrib par byed pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgrib par byed pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it has the nature of obscuration.

original: gang 'od gsal ba ni thob par bya ba ste /
analyzed: gang 'od gsal ba ni thob par bya ba ste /
translated: Luminosity is the object to be attained,

original: 'bras bu bde ba chen po dang skyob pa dang phan 'dogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'bras bu bde ba chen po dang skyob pa dang phan 'dogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the result, the great bliss, the protector, and the benefactor.

original: de'i phyir bsal bya ni rim gyis sel te skas lta bu'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir bsal bya ni rim gyis sel te skas lta bu'o //
translated: Therefore, the object to be removed is removed gradually, like a staircase.

original: thob bya ni gnyis ta gong ma thob pa dang / de dang 'brel pa thob pa ni 'bras bu gnas skabs pa ste skas lta bu'o //
analyzed: thob bya ni gnyis ta gong ma thob pa dang / de dang 'brel pa thob pa ni 'bras bu gnas skabs pa ste skas lta bu'o //
translated: The object to be attained is twofold: the attainment of the higher and the attainment of the connection with it. The temporary result is like a staircase.

original: 'od gsal ba thob pa ni mthar thug pa ste /
analyzed: 'od gsal ba thob pa ni mthar thug pa ste /
translated: The attainment of luminosity is the ultimate.

original: pha rol gyi 'gram bzhin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: pha rol gyi 'gram bzhin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: It is like the other side of a river.

original: gang las shes she na lung las shes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang las shes she na lung las shes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: From what is this known? It is known from scripture.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: The Bhagavat has said, etc.

original: blo gros chen po zhes pa ni bod pa'o //
analyzed: blo gros chen po zhes pa ni bod pa'o //
translated: Great Mind is a vocative.

original: me long gis zhes pa'i dpe dgod pa ste /
analyzed: me long gis zhes pa'i dpe dgod pa ste /
translated: The example of a mirror is stated.

original: dper na me long gi g-ya' sel ba'i dus su ni rim gyis sel te /
analyzed: dper na me long gi g-ya' sel ba'i dus su ni rim gyis sel te /
translated: For example, when the rust of a mirror is removed, it is removed gradually.

original: bzhin mthong ba ni cig car ro //
analyzed: bzhin mthong ba ni cig car ro //
translated: But the seeing of the face is instantaneous.

original: de'i gsal ba de yang gsal ba phyung ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i gsal ba de yang gsal ba phyung ba ni ma yin te /
translated: And that clarity of it is not produced by the removal of the clarity,

original: g-ya' bsal ba rim bzhin pas gsal ba thob par byed do //
analyzed: g-ya' bsal ba rim bzhin pas gsal ba thob par byed do //
translated: but by the removal of the rust in a gradual way, the clarity is attained.

original: de bzhin du zhes pa ni dpe dang 'brel pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du zhes pa ni dpe dang 'brel pa ste /
translated: Just so is the connection with the example.

original: me long gi gzugs dang 'dra bar zhe'o //
analyzed: me long gi gzugs dang 'dra bar zhe'o //
translated: Like the form in a mirror.

original: don bshad pa sems can thams cad kyi rang gi sems snang ba'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: don bshad pa sems can thams cad kyi rang gi sems snang ba'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bshad zin to //
translated: The explanation of the meaning: the appearances of their own minds and so on has been explained.

original: gzhan go sla'o //
analyzed: gzhan go sla'o //
translated: The rest is easy to understand.

original: 'dir bshad pa zhes pa ni gnas skabs 'dir lung gzhan gyis bshad pa'o //
analyzed: 'dir bshad pa zhes pa ni gnas skabs 'dir lung gzhan gyis bshad pa'o //
translated: Here, explained means explained in another scripture in this context.

original: sems can dang po'i las can ni las dang po pa'i rnal 'byor ro //🔽dam pa'i don la 'jug @245a * //
analyzed: sems can dang po'i las can ni las dang po pa'i rnal 'byor ro // dam pa'i don la 'jug @245a * //
translated: The beginner is the beginner yogi.

original: pa ni chos kyi sku thob par bya ba'i phyir zhe'o //
analyzed: pa ni chos kyi sku thob par bya ba'i phyir zhe'o //
translated: The entrance into the ultimate is for the sake of attaining the dharmakāya.

original: thabs 'di zhes pa ni rim pa drug pa'o //
analyzed: thabs 'di zhes pa ni rim pa drug pa'o //
translated: The method is the six stages.

original: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis zhes pa ni rdo rje 'chang la sogs pas so //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis zhes pa ni rdo rje 'chang la sogs pas so //
translated: The perfect buddhas are Vajradhara and so forth.

original: skas kyi rim pa lta bur zhes pa ni skas kyi rim pa dang 'dra bar te /
analyzed: skas kyi rim pa lta bur zhes pa ni skas kyi rim pa dang 'dra bar te /
translated: Like the steps of a ladder means like the steps of a ladder.

original: 'dis ni 'jig rten gyi gang zag dang / de'i khyad par dang dgos pa dang / thabs dang / gsung ba po dang / dpes nyan pa po rtog pa sngon du gtong ba tshim par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dis ni 'jig rten gyi gang zag dang / de'i khyad par dang dgos pa dang / thabs dang / gsung ba po dang / dpes nyan pa po rtog pa sngon du gtong ba tshim par 'gyur ro //
translated: This satisfies the listener's prior conceptualization of the mundane person, their distinctions, the purpose, the method, the speaker, and the example.

original: gzhan go sla'o //
analyzed: gzhan go sla'o //
translated: The rest is easy to understand.

original: spyod pa bsdus pa ni spyod pa nyung du byas pa ste /
analyzed: spyod pa bsdus pa ni spyod pa nyung du byas pa ste /
translated: The summary of conduct is the performance of little conduct.

original: gzhung rgyas pas 'jigs pa'o //
analyzed: gzhung rgyas pas 'jigs pa'o //
translated: It is fearing the extensive text.

original: the tshom yongs su gcod pa ni ngo bo la the tshom za ba dang / thams cad kyi go rims dang / gcig gi go rims dang / dgos pa dang rkyen dang / lung dang mi 'gal ba dang / mdo dang / rigs pa dang /
analyzed: the tshom yongs su gcod pa ni ngo bo la the tshom za ba dang / thams cad kyi go rims dang / gcig gi go rims dang / dgos pa dang rkyen dang / lung dang mi 'gal ba dang / mdo dang / rigs pa dang /
translated: Resolving doubts means resolving all doubts about the nature of the treatise, the order of all the chapters, the order of a single chapter, the purpose, the conditions, the scriptures, the sutras, the reasonings,

original: dpe dang / dus dang / grangs la sogs pa la the tshom za ba thams cad bsal ba ste /
analyzed: dpe dang / dus dang / grangs la sogs pa la the tshom za ba thams cad bsal ba ste /
translated: the examples, the times, the numbers, and so on.

original: le'u gang la the tshom yongs su gcod pa yod pa'i le'u de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: le'u gang la the tshom yongs su gcod pa yod pa'i le'u de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: A chapter in which doubts are resolved is called by that name.

original: klu sgrub kyis gsungs pa /
analyzed: klu sgrub kyis gsungs pa /
translated: Nagarjuna said:🔽The nature of the treatise, the whole, the parts, the order,

original: gang zag blo la ngo bo dang // mtha' dag phyogs gcig go rims dang // dgos pa dang ni skyon dag dang // rgyud mdo rigs pa dpe dang dus //
analyzed: gang zag blo la ngo bo dang // mtha' dag phyogs gcig go rims dang // dgos pa dang ni skyon dag dang // rgyud mdo rigs pa dpe dang dus //
translated: the purpose, the faults, the continuum, the sutras, the reasonings,🔽the examples, the times,

original: grangs la sogs pa'i rang bzhin la //
analyzed: grangs la sogs pa'i rang bzhin la //
translated: the numbers, and so on.

original: ma grub ma nges 'gal bar 'dzin //
analyzed: ma grub ma nges 'gal bar 'dzin //
translated: The nature of the treatise is not established, is uncertain, and is contradictory.

original: de yis som nyi bzlog pa'i phyir //
analyzed: de yis som nyi bzlog pa'i phyir //
translated: In order to reverse those doubts,

original: ngo bo la sogs rnam par bshad //
analyzed: ngo bo la sogs rnam par bshad //
translated: the nature and so on are explained.

original: ces pa dang / slob dpon gyi zhal nas /
analyzed: ces pa dang / slob dpon gyi zhal nas /
translated: And the master said:

original: gang zhig klu yi dgongs med par //
analyzed: gang zhig klu yi dgongs med par //
translated: Whoever explains the desire realm

original: 'dod rgya 'ba' zhig bshad pa la //
analyzed: 'dod rgya 'ba' zhig bshad pa la //
translated: without understanding the intention of the Nagas,

original: sdug bsngal 'ba' zhig dge rtse med //
analyzed: sdug bsngal 'ba' zhig dge rtse med //
translated: has only suffering, not virtue.

original: ces 'byung bas bla ma'i dgongs pa brtsal bar bya'o //
analyzed: ces 'byung bas bla ma'i dgongs pa brtsal bar bya'o //
translated: Therefore, one should seek the intention of the guru.

original: spyod pa bsdus pa'i sgron ma'i 'grel pa las le'u dang po'i bshad pa'o /
analyzed: spyod pa bsdus pa'i sgron ma'i 'grel pa las le'u dang po'i bshad pa'o /
translated: This concludes the explanation of the first chapter of the Commentary on the Lamp for the Collection of Practices.

original: // / de nas le'u gnyis pa bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: // / de nas le'u gnyis pa bshad par bya ste /
translated: Now, the second chapter should be explained.

original: dang po rang gi lus rnam par dben pa la ji ltar bslab par bgyi zhes pa ni thabs gang gi sgo nas zhes dris pa dang / lan du khams bzhi pos lus mngon par bskyed pa las shes pa 'dis ni lus kyi rgyu ston te /
analyzed: dang po rang gi lus rnam par dben pa la ji ltar bslab par bgyi zhes pa ni thabs gang gi sgo nas zhes dris pa dang / lan du khams bzhi pos lus mngon par bskyed pa las shes pa 'dis ni lus kyi rgyu ston te /
translated: First, How should one train in the emptiness of one's own body? is the question, Through what method? And the answer, From the generation of the body by the four elements, shows the cause of the body.

original: sa'i khams dang / chu dang me dang rlung ste /
analyzed: sa'i khams dang / chu dang me dang rlung ste /
translated: The four elements are the earth element, water, fire, and wind.

original: gyen du rgyu ba la sogs pas bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: gyen du rgyu ba la sogs pas bskyed pa'o //
translated: They are generated by upward movement and so forth.

original: spungs pa bzhin du gnas zhas pa dpe dgod pa ste /
analyzed: spungs pa bzhin du gnas zhas pa dpe dgod pa ste /
translated: It is said, It abides like a heap, which is the example.

original: 'bras kyi phung po bzhin no //
analyzed: 'bras kyi phung po bzhin no //
translated: Like a pile of rice.

original: gang spungs she na sha'i kham tshad ces pa la sogs pa @245b smos te /
analyzed: gang spungs she na sha'i kham tshad ces pa la sogs pa @245b smos te /
translated: What is heaped up? The passage beginning with “a mouthful of flesh” explains this.

original: sha'i kham tshad mang po spungs pas lus 'di sha'i phung po'o //
analyzed: sha'i kham tshad mang po spungs pas lus 'di sha'i phung po'o //
translated: This body is a heap of flesh because many mouthfuls of flesh are heaped up.

original: lung ston pa las gcig tu 'dzin pa'i phung po 'di phyogs la sogs pa'i chad phye na sha'i kham tshad 'dus pa ste /
analyzed: lung ston pa las gcig tu 'dzin pa'i phung po 'di phyogs la sogs pa'i chad phye na sha'i kham tshad 'dus pa ste /
translated: In the Vyākhyāyukti, this heap of the aggregates that is grasped as a unity is divided into directions, etc. and is a collection of mouthfuls of flesh.

original: dper na g-yag rnga dang ni'u gsing gi tshul zhe'o //
analyzed: dper na g-yag rnga dang ni'u gsing gi tshul zhe'o //
translated: For example, it is like a yak’s tail and a meadow.

original: gzhan go sla'o //
analyzed: gzhan go sla'o //
translated: The other is easy to understand.
